    • getWindowSamplesY

      public long getWindowSamplesY​(double ymin, double ymax, java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.lang.Long> iymin, java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.lang.Long> iymax)

    • getWindowExtrema

      public long getWindowExtrema​(long ixmin, long ixmax, long iymin, long iymax, java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.lang.Double> minimum, java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.lang.Double> maximum)
      Function: compute the minimum and maximum values of my z over all samples inside [ixmin, ixmax] * [iymin, iymax]. Arguments: if ixmin = 0, start at first column; if ixmax = 0, end at last column (same for iymin and iymax). Return value: the number of samples inside the window. Postconditions: if result == 0, *minimum and *maximum are not changed;
